        Checks if the app has connectivity to the Internet
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if has connection to the Internet and false if it doesn't

           int duration)
        Make the smartphone vibrate for a giving time.you need to put the vibration permission in the manifest as follows:
        Parameters:
        context - context in which the smartphone will vibrate
        duration - duration of the vibration in miliseconds

      • toast

        public static void toast(Context context,
         java.lang.String message,
         int duration)
        Quick toast method
        Parameters:
        context - context in which will be displayed
        message - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        duration - How long to display the message. Either Toast.LENGTH_SHORT or Toast.LENGTH_LONG
